results.definition: an interest followed with exaggerated zeal
a system of religious beliefs and rituals
examples: devoted to the cultus of the Blessed Virgin

results.definition: a religion or sect that is generally considered to be unorthodox, extremist, or false
followers of an exclusive system of beliefs and practices
followers of an unorthodox, extremist, or false religion or sect who often live outside of conventional society under the direction of a charismatic leader
